lines.text: Hey, Sarge, where yug goin'?
I got my first three day liberty, Tommy. I'm goin' to losAngeles.
You got a date?
No.
You call this number when you get there.
I don't like blind dates!
She'll be sober when you get there. Give 'er a ring.
What's she like?
Out of this world!
Out of this world, huh?
Well, L.A. city limits... how much farther can you get?
What's she look like - an umbrella?

Are you kiddin'? She's a beauty! Big brown eyes like saucers, and when she smiles, she flashes the most beautiful set of teeth you ever saw and what a build! The girl has a figure out of the world. When you see this gir'ls figure... Now I've seen a lotta figures. Now I know what I'm talkin' about! She's got the most... wait aa minute. I'll get my hat. I'll go with yuh.
You know, I bet it would be more fun to shoot Japs than bears.

[Complaining about the Guadalcanal foxhole situation]
No hole! No sleep! No chow! No smiles! No mail! Not enough planes! Not enough navy! Not enough doctors! We're on the ropes and the referee's up to eight.
No, no, this is their chance. They've been gettin' reinforcements/ We haven't. They'll come sooner or later.
I'll take sooner.
I'll take later.
Lucy, I want a kiss that'll last me me the duration. You got one like that?
I'll do my darnedest.
What makes men do such crazy things?
Women!
Probably see a lot more action before this is over.
Looks that way. My arm's comin' along good now.
Funny... sittin' around thinkin' of you landing on a beachhead again.
When I hit the beach, I'll mark the first nip for you, Al.

[Bitterly]
Get him in the eyes! Right in the eyes!
Just for luck, maybe the ship'll come in tomorrow with some mail on it.
Why is it that everything good is always gonna happen tomorrow?
Well, there's nothing wrong with a shotgun wedding if you own a shotgun.

[Hearing news on the radio]
Jim, where's Pearl Harbor?
Pearl Harbor? Oh, it's down the Jersey Coast near Atlantic City someplace.
